data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Sachsen-Anhalt, Germany.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sachsen-Anhalt, Germany
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Sachsen-Anhalt do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 2,356,200 people living in the state of Sachsen-Anhalt.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Sachsen-Anhalt. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Thai people. Make the Thai people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Sachsen-Anhalt, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Sachsen-Anhalt. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sachsen-Anhalt, Germany has a population of 2,356,200.

We estimate Sachsen-Anhalt has 49,107 people who might know Jesus, 1,394,319 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 912,773 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 47 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Sachsen-Anhalt, Germany into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.
